column2:
"The Devil Castle summoned by Lutz loomed large over its
surroundings. It was almost as if it were protecting the capital.
Nevertheless, it soon fell to the Guardian's power."

"Lutz doggedly refused to surrender
and fled into the castle's interior."

"Harriet and the others pursued Lutz,
to end the fight once and for all."

"Inside Cuent Royal Capital, the battle for
the fate of a nation is coming to a close."
"NO... NO! NO! NO! This is not happening!"
"The power of the Devil Castles, Ephimera... defeated... at the hands of man!"
"Lutz! There is no escape!"
"No, there's still time...! If I kill you all, right here, I shall reign supreme!"
"Such destructive power...! Is this the power of Ephimera as well?"
"This is its power when used as a mere catalyst. You understand why the other nations agreed to study it?"
"Now's not the time to act cool!"
"If only Ephimera didn't..."
"HAAAA!!"
"Ugh, my Ephimera...! HARRIET!!!"
"GAAH!"
"May I ask you to refrain from using violence against my sister?"
"I did it all for this nation... Why must you interfere! HARRIET! LUTHER!"
"This nation? Don't make me laugh. Which part of your plan was considered charity and good will?"
"This nation and its people do not desire war. It was the Guardian, the Savior of Legends, who provided us with their assistance."
"Uncle..."

"Alisa! That's it, use your power.
Destroy these insolent fools, and
then we shall have peace...!"
"I will not. Neither my strength nor my sword are to be used here."

"Alisa! Even you, as the Sword
Maiden, seek to betray me!?
Have you forgotten who took you in!?"
"Please surrender, Uncle. Justice isn't on your side."
"You can still make amends. Join us, and use your powers for the sake of the people, once more..."
"The people? Join you? Enough, Sword Maiden..."
"Uncle...?"
"Our knowledge and power exist for a sole purpose... Yes, a singular purpose..."
"In this land, this world... We exist only as an offering...! Ephimera exists for that reason!"
"Is he trying to make the Mana go crazy!? How far will you go with these delusions of yours?!"
"You're all coming along with me! This world must stay broken! I must destroy history!"
"All of the exits are blocked off! If we don't do something, we're going to end up amongst the rubble!"
"Sword of Legend... Lend me your strength!"
"Transient Wings, come forth!"
"Exit!"
"Huh...? We're outside the castle?"
"We've teleported? But magic like that doesn't exist..."
"There is... An ancient spell, passed down to the Sword Maiden."
"I was not sure if it would work. However, the sword answered my call."
"<%me>, did you see it?"

"Nor did I. I couldn't detect anything.
Even as ARKS, our technology cannot
teleport instantly without preparing first."
"Maybe it's similar to what Alma uses... what she calls Magic."
"What... the castle, it's..."
"Driven mad with power, you're now falling down. The throne that you so desired has become your tomb. I hope you're satisfied... Lutz."
"What did you find, Varuna? Was there any sign of Lutz...?"
"We weren't able to confirm... However, we're sure that he was caught in the collapse."
"I see..."
"Lady Alisa..."
"I'm fine... I was prepared to face the facts. It was clear that my uncle was no longer the same man during his final moments."
"I wonder... was he merely insane?"
"What...?"
"It seemed to me as if he were under the influence of something greater."
"Brother... what do you mean by \"something greater\"?"
"I'm not sure just yet... However, I do know that if this wasn't a larger issue, the Savior wouldn't have appeared."
"It's not just this nation's problem. This is the beginning of a cataclysm that involves the entire world. Isn't that right, Guardian?"
"The Prisoners of Ephimera"
"The Delusions of the Seedless Flower"
